Under a White Sky: The Nature of the Future bụ akwụkwọ gburu-gburu ébé obibi nke afọ 2021 nkè Elizabeth Kolbert dere. Akwụkwọ ahụ na-agbaso ọtụtụ n'ime isiokwu ndị ọ nyochara na The Sixth Extinction: An Unnatural History

N'okpuru Eluigwe na-acha ọcha na-elekwasị ányà n'ụdị nsogbu gburu-gburu ébé obibi dị íchè íchè nke Anthropocene mepụtara na ogo dị íchè íchè dị íchè íchè màkà ihe ngwọta teknụzụ dị màkà ụmụ mmadụ iji dozie ha ma na-akatọkwa usoro teknụzụ zuru oke.

Aha ahụ na-ezo aka na usoro mgbochi mgbanwe ihu igwe kachasị njọ, solar geoengineering, nke e mèrè iji gosipụta ìhè anyanwụ site n'ụwa. N'ime akwụkwọ ahụ, ọ na-enyocha otu ngwọta teknụzụ màkà otu nsogbu nwèrè ike isi duga na nsogbu ndị ọzọ ma na-ekweta ọrụ dị mkpa teknụzụ ndị ahụ nwere ike ịrụ.
Mmeghachi omume nke akwụkwọ ahụ dị mmá n'ozuzu ya
The Washington Post toro ya màkà "ịgwakọta njem, akụkọ sayensị na akụkọ nkọwa, ihe niile nwere ikike nke ónyé édémédé nwéré obi ike iji kweta mgbagwoju anya
" Nnyocha New York Times lekwasịrị anya n'otú akwụkwọ ahụ si enyocha mgbagwoju anya nke nsogbu gburu-gburu ébé obibi anyị ugbu a. Nnyocha NPR kọwara akwụkwọ ahụ dị ka "ịkọọ" site na igosi

N'emeghị ka onye na-agụ ya tie ya ihe n'isi, ọ na-eme ka o doo ányà ébé anyị nọ kemgbe site n'ụwa nke enweghị nsogbu, nke zuru oke na ébé anyị ga-aga ịchọta nguzozi ọhụrụ màkà ọdịnihu ụwa nke ka nwere anyị ụmụ mmadụ na ya
" Jeff Goodell nke Rolling Stone toro Kolbert site n'ikwu, "Iji bụrụ nwa amaala maara nke ọma nke Planet Earth, ọ dị mkpà ịgụ Elizabeth Kolbert..."

N'okpuru White Sky ka edepụtara màkà 2021 Wainwright Prize na Global Conservation Writing category. Akwụkwọ ahụ mèrè ndepụta ogologo màkà 2022 Andrew Carnegie Medal for Excellence in Nonfiction. A họọrọ ya màkà ndepụta "10 Best Books of 2021" nke Washington Post.
